about_the_game:
My Faithful and Loyal Wife Would Never Cheat on Me is a free, provocative adult visual novel crafted to captivate the senses and challenge the very essence of trust.

Join Karl, a regular guy and forum moderator of an adult game community, in a story that unravels the ups and downs of married life. Karl finds himself ensnared in a whirlwind of suspicion when his beloved wife, Stacey, begins staying late at the office.

As Karl grapples with his insecurities, Tyrone Bullman, Stacey's new boss, becomes a source of doubt in his seemingly perfect marriage. Late-night rendezvous, secretive conversations, and an air thick with tension lead Karl down a path of uncertainty, pushing the boundaries of his once-unshakable confidence.

Will Karl succumb to the paranoia threatening to consume him, or will he unveil the shocking truth that lies beneath the surface?

content_descriptors.notes:
My Faithful and Loyal Wife Would Never Cheat on Me is an adult visual novel intended only for mature audiences.

This game contains adult language, nudity, sexual themes, and explicit graphic sexual content in the form of visual imagery.

All sexual scenes are vividly described and are portrayed visually and explicitly.
